translations: n.联合企业，财团；<法律>配偶的相互权利；联合

sentences.sentence: Industry consortiums define industry business processes.
sentences.translation: 行业联盟定义行业业务流程。

sentences.sentence: JBIC encourages Japanese firms to form consortiums to increase their heft.
sentences.translation: JBIC鼓励日本公司组成联盟以增加分量。

sentences.sentence: JBIC encourages Japanese firms to form consortiums to increase their heft.
sentences.translation: 日本国际协力银行鼓励日本企业组成财团以增加其分量。
